alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 3:18AM PST until February 21 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Across Idaho, the strongest winds are expected east of Boise. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers may result in reduced visibility and increased travel hazard.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
